gossip info: Sergey Petrov expressed dissatisfaction with an investor rejecting his proposal, attributing the incident to a lack of trust in his ventures and pointing to reputational issues as a concern. He is considering high-profile collaborations to improve his visibility and credibility, emphasizing the need for partnerships that align with his personal gain and interests. Petrov is determined not to let this setback deter him and plans to recalibrate and return stronger.
reasons: The information comes from Sergey Petrov, who seems to have a credible standing and his dissatisfaction reflects concerns which may affect professional relationships. Spreading this could help others be aware of potential issues and help facilitate better communication.
